author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-140: Resolves this issue by adding support for uninstalling Resources installed from a Bundle. For this to work I had to upgrade to a newer version of the Sling Installer framework.
In addition I removed the UnsupportedOperationException thrown by the IndexRemoveTask to avoid repeating tries to uninstall SolrIndexes until STANBOL-287 is implemented.
